HPI 8048 FET Sports Nissan Skyline GT-R 1993 JTC Series 13th/14th Place K. Misaki/N. Nagasaka

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer Page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/en/line_up/index_8048.php

The nifty blue & white FET Sport livery is about the only thing going for this car. Kiyoshi Misaki & Naoki Nagasaka both raced in the JTC from the inaugural season in 1985 - sometimes as teammates like in the 1993 season. Their best result of the season was a 2nd place finish in the final round - the Fuji Inter-Tec 500 km. Despite competing in all 9 races of the season they finished second to last - ahead of Anders Olofsson who only entered 1 race. Nagasaka won the JTC championship in 1985 (BMW 635CSi) & 1987 (Ford Sierra RS Cosworth/Sierra RS500). Misaki never won a race - any race.
